text: Can you give me the stock price of AAPL on January 4, 2023?
Sure, I can help you with that. [QueryStock(stock_code='AAPL', date='2023-01-04')]
The stock price of AAPL on January 4, 2023 is $185.2.
That's great, thank you. Can you also help me open a bank account?
Of course! What account identifier would you like to use?
And what password would you like to use?
Okay, I will create an account with the information you provided.
Your account has been created successfully.
